content: this pattern for an itty bitty dress is design to fit my teeny tiny toys 1 you can make these toys in different sizes by varying the yarn and needle size used eg 2 25mm with 4 ply yarn 3mm with dk yarn 3 25mm with aran yarn as long as you use the same needle size for the dress as you used for the toy it should fit 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/teeny-tiny-knitted-toys
